body_html: The script it's looking for is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/scripts/build_host_protoc.sh . The "caffe2" in "\caffe2\scripts" is referring to the top level name of the entire github repo, which is now pytorch. I will update the instructions to be a little clearer.

body: The script it's looking for is https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/scripts/build_host_protoc.sh . The "caffe2" in "\caffe2\scripts" is referring to the top level name of the entire github repo, which is now pytorch. I will update the instructions to be a little clearer.
